title: Desert Rain Frog
desc:
Post 3128
Attack - None
Defense - None
- The Desert Rain Frog resides on a sandy shore between the sea and sand dunes. It is able to kick sand into a player's eyes, preventing them from receiving any feedback tonight.
Attributes -
- The Desert Rain Frog is nocturnal, meaning it knows how to avoid danger at night. It cannot be detected visiting its targets.
Goal - Keep your habitat from being destroyed and kill those who want to destroy it.
